version_description:
- Redesigned app menu
- Improved support for PCGS graded banknotes, including images (if available)
- Added simplified and traditional Chinese localizations
- Bug fixes and additional improvements

- NEW: app icon
- A couple of bug fixes

v1.6
- Greatly improved barcode scanning speed
- Improved icon
- Other fixes and improvements

If you love this app please leave a review! If you run into any issues email app@pcgs.com and we will work with you to resolve the issue.

v1.7.1
- Minor behind the scenes improvements

v1.9.3
- Minor bug fixes

** If you love this app please leave a review! If you run into any issues email app@pcgs.com and we will work with you to resolve the issue.

- Chinese translation improvements

v1.8.0
- New app icon
- Population and variety improvements
- Additional fields for banknotes

** If you love this app please leave a review! If you run into any issues email app@pcgs.com and we will work with you to resolve the issue.

v1.9.0
- Now fully supports deep links from US and China cert verification URLs
- Improved handling of cached cert data
- Improved refreshing of data
- Improved saving Trueview images
- Added PCGS social network links to the Menu
- UI enhancements
- Various bug fixes

** If you love this app please leave a review! If you run into any issues email app@pcgs.com and we will work with you to resolve the issue.
